snippet: With roots in Tunisian and Sardinian cooking, fregola has become an attractive ingredient for American cooks, especially among chefs....

headline.main: Deutsche Boerse's EEX Says Takes Over U.S. Peer Nodal
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Boerse's EEX Says Takes Over U.S. Peer Nodal

lead_paragraph: With roots in Tunisian and Sardinian cooking, fregola has become an attractive ingredient for American cooks, especially among chefs.
